behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Ahhh, another one, roused from the sleep of death?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
Well, you're not alone. We Unkindled are worthless.
Can't even die right.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Gives me conniptions.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
And they'd have us seek the Lords of Cinder,
and return them to their moulding thrones.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text:
But we're talking true legends with the mettle to link the fire.
We're not fit to lick their boots.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Don't you think?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
#0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: What a sick joke.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
Asking us to seek the Lords of Cinder,
and return them to their moulding thrones.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text:
We're talking true legends, those who would link the fire.
We're not fit to lick their boots.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
#0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text: Oooh, yet to give in, eh?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text: Good. The Fire Keeper must be twitching with delight.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
But what do you really know about these Lords of Cinder,
these supposed legends?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text: Let's take Aldrich, for one.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
A right and proper cleric,
only, he developed a habit of devouring men.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
He ate so many that he bloated like a drowned pig,
then softened into sludge,
so they stuck him in the Cathedral of the Deep.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
And they made him a Lord of Cinder.
Not for virtue, but for might.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
Such is a lord, I suppose.
But here I ask. Do we have a sodding chance?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
#0Talk-2nd time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
At the foot of Lothric Castle,
an old path still runs below the tower in the Undead Settlement.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text:
It was used to transport sacrifices to the Cathedral of the Deep.
You should see where it leads.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
subdialogue_text: ...If you've the stones for it.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after raising the Small Lothric Banner
#0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
You haven't given up yet?
 Then you're a brasher lad than I thought.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
You haven't given up yet?
 Then you're a brasher lass than I thought.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: You can make better use of this.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
A medallion to gain entry to the keep
of the Undead Legion of Farron,
Lords of Cinder in their own right.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: I don't need it. Not now I've flown the coop.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
#0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: The Undead Legion of Farron is a caravan of Undead.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
Sworn by wolf's blood to contain the Abyss,
the Legion will bury a kingdom at the first sign of exposure.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: Joyous bunch, really.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: Gaining admission to the Legion is a matter of some ceremony.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of
three altars opens the door to the wolf blood.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: Even accursed Undead want to believe they're special, it seems.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: I pity the sorry souls.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
#0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: Gaining admission to the Legion is a matter of some ceremony.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text:
Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of
three altars opens the door to the wolf blood.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: Even accursed Undead want to believe they're special, it seems.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
subdialogue_text: I pity the sorry souls.

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Curse-rotted Greatwood or Crystal Sage
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
subdialogue_text: What is it, now!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Enough, you fool!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: What in bloody hell is wrong with you!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: I'm a deserter, I know.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: But I've still plenty of fight in me...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: We'll never amount to anything, not you, not I...

behavior: #0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: You crawled out of the ground, for gods' sake...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: You offed the Lords of Cinder, the Undead Legion...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: So that's how they're delivered to their thrones...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
#0Talk-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: I pity the sorry souls. Is that really lordship's last reward?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
#0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Ah, I failed to thank you.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: For helping them find their final resting place...

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
#0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: I pity the sorry souls. Is that really lordship's last reward?

behavior: #0Talk-3rd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
#0Talk-Outside of Firelink Shrine at the Grave
subdialogue_text: The poor, wretched souls...

behavior: #0Talk-Outside of Firelink Shrine at the Grave
subdialogue_text: Be they lord or legend, the curse shows no mercy.

behavior: #0Talk-Outside of Firelink Shrine at the Grave
subdialogue_text: What a sham.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-1st time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: What is it, now!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-2nd time after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Are you mad?

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Lost your head, have you?

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Then I suppose I'll have to step in.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: And avenge the poor lost souls...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Who can deny the curse? You poor bastard.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Who can deny the curse? You poor girl.

behavior: #0Upon dying after defeating the Abyss Watchers
subdialogue_text: Go on, be as bloody mad as you like.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum
subdialogue_text: Ahh, this is unexpected.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum
subdialogue_text: Well, I've decided to stop running from my fate.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum
subdialogue_text: Loathe me all you like, I shall take what makes you dragon.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum, after previusly summoning him
subdialogue_text: Ahh, I should've known.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum, after previusly summoning him
subdialogue_text: Well, I've decided to stop running from my fate.

behavior: #0Approaching in Farron Mausoleum, after previusly summoning him
subdialogue_text: Loathe me all you like, I shall take what makes you dragon.

behavior: #0After approaching him & he has previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Ahh, there you are.

behavior: #0After approaching him & he has previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: This shall be no petty theft.

behavior: #0After approaching him & he has previously killed the protagonist
subdialogue_text: As the true dragon, I shall take what is rightfully mine.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Loathe me all you like, but I am the true dragon...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: You are a dragon, more dragon than I.

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text:
##Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of
four altars opens the door to the wolf blood.

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text:
##Inside their keep, snuffing out the flames of
four altars opens the door to the wolf blood.

behavior: #0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##What a bloody joke...

behavior: #0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##Trapped within your wretched curse.

behavior: #0Upon dying
#0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: ##A deserter could hope for no better place to die.
